text:
俺、トレモロ
ブラッドストーム
サーペントロードが
テメェの限界に
挑戦だ、
金曜朝
場所はここ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9%;top: 8%;width: 138px;height: 128px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

text:
勝てば
ギターは
そのまま…
負けたら
返せ
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69%;top: 22%;width: 102px;height: 105px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

text:
もし挑戦を
拒否すれば…
そしたら…
style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72%;top: 32.5%;width: 102px;height: 87px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 55px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11%;top: 61.8%;width: 503px;height: 46px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;transform: rotate(3deg);border-radius: 0%;
